name: Cube Simulator (Nehal_V)
description:
Welcome to Cube Simulator, the greatest simulator in the world! Move a cube around the world and explore your environment!

Cube Simulator is still in beta, so have fun!

W,A,S,D - move around
Q,E - rotate camera

If you upload a lets play of this game, send me the YouTube link if you want to and I'll add the video to the thumbnails! It gives you promotion for your channel and promotion for my game!

Thank you to Gnarly Gecko for reviewing my game! It means a lot man, thank you!

 http://www.bensound.com/royalty-free- music
